unnormalised: In the rapidly evolving landscape of Education Technology, Adaptive Learning is gaining significant traction. It's essentially personalized learning where the system adjusts to the individual student's needs based on their performance. Think of it like this: instead of a one-size-fits-all lecture, imagine each student, say Priya from IIT Madras, receiving content tailored to her strengths and weaknesses in real-time.

unnormalised: The beauty of adaptive learning lies in its ability to identify knowledge gaps early on. If Rohan in Delhi is struggling with a particular concept in trigonometry, the system will provide him with extra practice problems and explanations until he grasps it. No more getting lost in the syllabus!
